CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "Mr.", "Gentile Signore " + Account.LastName, "Mrs.", "Gentile Signora " + Account.LastName, "Ms.", "Gentile Signora " + Account.LastName, ""), "Ciao " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation Email It
